column2: for Yavanna and Oromë report that Morgoth might rise once more in power. They discuss the forthcomingness of the Children of Ilúvatar and whether to bring light to Middle-earth.
Varda uses the light from Telperion to fashion new stars
column3: and organize them (and those already wrought) into constellations. The greatest of these constellations was the Menelmacar.
